item_1A:
ITEM 1A. RISK FACTORS
Under current SEC rules, as a smaller reporting company, we are not required to provide risk factor disclosure in this Report or in any of our periodic reports until such time as we no longer qualify as a smaller reporting company. However, we included a comprehensive set of risk factors in a registration statement on Form S-1 we filed last year, which was declared effective by the SEC on December 23, 2021, and can be accessed here: https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/0001691077/000149315221031270/forms-1a.htm
